sentences: Minulla on hyvä työkalu tähän projektiin.
Tämä on työkalu, jota tarvitsen käsityöhön.
context: The Finnish word 'työkalu' means 'tool' in English. It refers to an instrument or device used to carry out a particular function, especially for mechanical purposes. The word is commonly used when referring to physical tools like hammers, screwdrivers, saws, etc., but can also refer to more abstract tools such as software applications or methods that help accomplish tasks.
